thread.title: Benghazi investigator says Clinton showdown is about facts
thread.title_full: Benghazi investigator says Clinton showdown is about facts

author: MATTHEW DALY
title: Benghazi investigator says Clinton showdown is about facts
text:
Cliff Owen Benghazi investigator says Clinton showdown is about facts 
FILE - In this Sept. 15, 2015 file photo, House Benghazi Committee Chairman Trey Gowdy, R-S.C. speaks reporters on Capitol Hill in Washington. Gowdy is a man under siege. The three-term Republican congressman from South Carolina chairs the embattled House committee investigating the deadly 2012 attacks in Benghazi, Libya. (AP Photo/Cliff Owen, File) Cliff Owen Benghazi investigator says Clinton showdown is about facts 
FILE - In this Sept. 4, 2015, file photo, House Benghazi Committee Chairman Trey Gowdy, R-S.C., walks to a hearing room on Capitol Hill in Washington. Gowdy is a man under siege. The three-term Republican congressman from South Carolina chairs the embattled House committee investigating the deadly 2012 attacks in Benghazi, Libya. (AP Photo/Cliff Owen, File) Posted: Saturday, October 17, 2015 10:34 am 
WASHINGTON (AP) — Rep. Trey Gowdy is a man under fierce pressure as he leads a congressional Benghazi investigation that's dismissed by Democrats as partisan and even questioned by some fellow Republicans. Login required
